Author: nizarsalim
Review: In Ant-Man and the Wasp Quantumania, there are a lot of things and elements that deserve praise. The story and its depth and elements, addition of the independent world of the Quantum Realm, soundtrack, actions scenes, visual and sound effects, direction, screenplay, performances of the cast (especially the one of Majors), comedic moments, entertainment value, ending, which certainly points out that there is still a lot more to come in the future of the MCU, along with the mid and post credits scenes, finally, all deserve all praise.

Author: linneasr
Review: I enjoyed this film. Jonathan Majors was brilliant and his scenes with Michelle Pfeiffer were excellent. I'm not fond of Evangeline Lily, so I liked that Kathryn Newton was front and centre, along with Michelle Pfeiffer. The narrative about the multiverse advanced in an intriguing way.

Author: kkennedy-97351
Review: I really have no clue where these negative reviews are coming from. Was it as good as Endgame? No. Ragnarok? No. But it was a refreshing break from the problems & ridiculousness of Phase 4. Aside from the odd casting of Cassie (plus the dialogue between her and Scott is silly), the cast was excellent. Michael Douglas comes full circle. Scott's and Hope's story is solid, and the crazy cast of characters in the Quantum Realm are terrific. Great set up for the Kang era of Marvel. The end credits are very well done, especially the final one. All in all, I think this movie is very good, and I'll see it again!

Author: keithebrown
Review_Title: Solid MCU flick, creates new universe too
Review: I watched twice in theater & enjoyed it even better 2nd viewing. I think CGI is dazzling and humor throughout. Michelle Pfeiffer & Paul Rudd don't age. Jonathan Majors is stellar. Lots of new weird side-characters introduced in the subatomic microverse & is important bc it is outside of the multiverse's space & time. The after credits scenes, especially the first, is a literal translation of an old Marvel comic book panel & shiws where MCU is headed. I guess it's cool to hate on Marvel superhero flicks (this movie is WAY better then the first Ferngully, I mean Avatar). There aren't many movies that tempt me to spend money on theaters anymore, but QuANTaMANia is worth the $$$.

Author: BrnzReviews
Review: I've been quite excited for this one for quite a while now, the hype was built over such a long period of time, especially for comic book fans. Paul Rudd is back at it again as our favourite witty geek Scott Lang. Only this time Ant-Man and the Wasp find themselves exploring the Quantum Realm, interacting with strange new creatures and embarking on an adventure that pushes them beyond the limits of what they thought was possible, honestly it's insane!

Author: demol_isher1
Review_Title: I loved it, its not perfect but it is surely a good movie
Review: I loved it, its not perfect but it is surely a good movie. Atleast it is not bad like the multiverse and the phase 4. I liked how it was a complete adventure, it sure was loose but i dont care as i had seen so much bad movies and series of mcu in phase 4. Kang part was completely new so although the story was loose sometimes but in order to know what the kang will do, how he will behave and how he will become superior than thanos, i was completely submerged in the movie and i am just curious for new movies. Hope mcu solves the problems of phase 4. To be honest, no matter how much powerfull is kang but i liked Thanos a lot more. Love the quantum realm. Awesome movie from my side.

Author: kmthompson-53778
Review_Title: Great start to Phase 5- with a couple of exceptions
Review: I would give this an honest 8.5, but I will be generous and round up to a 9. I went to the movie having low expectations given the rough critic reviews. I was surprised- I thought it should have been rated a bit higher than it was. I thought the acting was fantastic, the CGI was great (with the exception of MODOK). And the comedy was not too much (as it was in Thor Love and Thunder). The pacing was good for the most part, although some parts were a little slow.

Author: willstancil
Review_Title: Review from a diehard Marvel fan
Review: I have been a mega fan of marvel since the age of 3. I started reading the comics at 5 and then continued to look up what happened in the issues that I did not own. Point is that I am a person who will live and die by marvel. I genuinely that this is a positive step for Marvel. Marvel is starting to seriously branch out from the comics and is making it's own story. For past films, the stories have been loosely based on issues and series. Now the audience is thrown headfirst into a wacky yet deeply terrifying world. The performances for the movie are phenomenal, Kathrine Newton has seriously improved since her mediocre performance in Detective Pikachu. The movie is visually pleasing, and seems like it would be a fever dream to watch while inebriated. I noticed that there were many reviews commenting on the graphics, which astounded me because the set is gorgeous and so are the characters, well most of them. I can only think that the graphics related reviews are talking about MODOK. I agree that I am not a fan of the skin design and the bulbous stretched face. But I think that it was a creative design and they made jokes about it in the film, almost like he is supposed to look awful. I think that if this is what the MCU looks like, I am fully ready to support it. All that said, I do not believe that this is the best MCU film, but it is far from the worst. Please give the film a try and go into it lookin g for a good time and not expecting a bad one.

Author: pyhckd
Review: Saw the premiere tonight and I felt like it was the early 2000s and the old Marvel again. Great plot getting ready to tie into MUCH bigger storyline, along with good humor. Not corny overdone humor (like the last Thor). The theater was packed an everyone around us agreed 10/10. Anyone saying this is a small plot, it's SUPPOSED to be, and I would question your dedication to the almost 20 years of Marvel movies. You have to live and adore them to understand how important this movie was to the next phase. I'm excited to see all the new storylines and build up to the next Avenger like movie. Disney/Marvel has done it again!

Author: aleybassem
Review: This movie definetly brought my hopes up for the rest of the phase. I think some of the jokes could have landed better, but still, anything is better than those Thor: Love and Thunder jokes. The VFX is Oscar-Worthy, except...

Author: darkman4801789
Review_Title: Critics are wrong more then the weather man
Review: After reading the critics reviews I wasn't expecting it to be great but man were they wrong. The movie kicks it into high gear fast and speeds up. Fresh ideas and environment for the 3rd installment in the Antman trilogy! The effects look amazing you can really be amazed with the 360 screen they shot in. I always enjoyed the humor in all three films but this one feels a little more adult then the other 2. All the actors in this movie did a great job but jonathon majors really sticks out as a great performance and breathes new life into what seemed like a dying franchise. Make sure to stay for the 2 post credit scenes.

Author: maddogmilner
Review_Title: Far better than I was told
Review: This is the best Marvel movie of the phase, which is on a par with Shang-Chi for me (haven't seen Guardians 3 yet though). To summarise: action all the way through, superb effects, funny (but not trying to be too funny like Thor 4), decent character development and a good story arc. Oh, scary bad guy - I hope Jonathan Majors is allowed to keep the role. There's so much more story to tell - after having super hero fatigue since Endgame, I now feel energised and dying to watch how the new story arc develops!

Author: deepakmishradipu
Review: The movie is mind-blowing, fantastic and has all the elements that fans need. Marvel is growing up with a very large scale. Every characters have their own presence. Finally the mid and post credit scenes are icing on the cake. Definitely a fest for audiences after a long long time. An insane build-up to the MCU phase 5. Avengers Kang denasty should be 10 times bigger than endgame. A kickoff start for phase 5 and way to go. Eagerly waiting what's next in the lineups.

Review: This movie was extremely enjoyable! Watched in 4D, and the ride was wild. It was fun and funny. I'm not sure what people want out of this genre, considering it's a comic book coming to life. Maybe Marvel has just become too ubiquitous for people. Either way, I enjoyed it a lot and will go back to see it again. I'm really excited for the Jonathan Major's phase of the MCU. I think the poor ratings are coming from critics who take themselves a bit too seriously. Just have fun with it. I thought the CGI was good, especially in 3D. There was a really cool throw to actual quantum physics with the probability storms, which I appreciated.

Author: xcbrvfsqq

Everything is excellent, the script is excellent, the director, screenwriter, producers, composer, visual effects specialists, all the actors and the rest of the film and studio team did great!!! I really love this movie and want to watch it again and again, I adore all these actors and the characters they play, I hope we will see them again as soon as possible! For me, this is one of the best MCU movies!!! Thanks to everyone who worked on this wonderful project!!!

Author: fairdinkumpete
Review:
I've watched and grown since Iron Man on the MCU to the point where I've had kids and have only just been able to see this movie at home. I don't know why people have criticised this film, it's probably one of the best movies since Endgame. With any Marvel

Author: toonarly
Review: Love these ant man movies. They have the best cast for this especially the main. He's perfect for this role. Lots of humor as always, this one doesn't have Michael Peña, but that is because he never made it into the quantum realm yet, so he was missed. Especially his way of explaining stuff. CGI is top notch and all the different creative imaginative creatures are just stunning. Someone went to a LOT of detail here. Some are just plain weird. Bill Murray in it is a great addition too. Plot is awesome and quite possibly this new villain is far more dangerous than Thanos ever was!!! He's quite a viscous villain more so than Thanos. So they've set the universe up to deal with this new multiverse threat which is great. Fits with all the marvel stuff so far perfectly, enjoy with whole family, nothing questionable in it at all , a few cuss words and a lot of great fights that's about all there. Enjoy!!! I will watch this again. Soon. 😊

Author: silyolmehee-879-252097
Review: Action almost at the very beginning, not slow at all and great way of bringing in characters. REALLY enjoyed this one more than other Marvel Movies!

Author: juliangabrielgray
Review_Title: Like Doctor Who and Starwars gave birth to sheer brilliance
Review: As my review title suggests, this movie was like a great superhero movie meets Journey to the Centre of the earth, then Doctor Who and Starwars gave birth to sheer brilliance.

Author: johnjamespollard
Review_Title: Surprisingly good with plenty of great moments
Review: I thought this was really well done and the criticisms of the CGI are generally unwarranted. I went into it thinking it was going to be terrible due to negative reviews but was pleasantly surprised to find out they were wrong. This was a pretty great movie overall with lots of action and spectacle. MODOK was intentionally goofy looking but was actually a fun character and an important part of the plot. Was it the best marvel movie ever? No, but it was really enjoyable and quite intense at times. Star Wars vibes? Absolutely, but also a cool exploration into the quantum realm. Definitely not disappointing. I will probably watch it again when it comes to Disney +

Author: kevinvasquezkv
Review: From Start to finish this movie has your attention. It's built off of the events of endgame on the outside world, but once you shrink down to the Quantum Realm. It then shows you the events that happened with Janet and the time she spent with Kang and how she knew who he was & for the all the right reasons she wanted to keep him a secret from the world and her family. Definitely the strongest of the 3 films with non stop hand to hand combat that Ant Man gives us with his Maximum effort spectacular abilities. Kang is the new big bad and my god he is scary. Only reason this movie isn't a 10 is because I would of like to of seen our X-con security team in the movie.

Author: waynesl-31018
Review: Honestly there are a lot of people on here that are being too tough on this film, it is like you had already decided you didn't like it before you went to watch it.

Author: williamrbabcock
Review: The pretentious film students are. I had a dual major of English and Film, the latter becoming my primary focus, especially screenwriting. In the litany of screenwriting classes I had taken, they all reinforced the same ideal; their has to be a character arc. They have to change somehow from how it started to how it ends. While I don't totally disagree, I do call shenanigans on that.

Author: wesleylittle
Review: I never read any of the marvel comics. So I appreciate this for what it is. A good movie. Ant Man was always my favorite superhero, so this movie was really cool to see. It doesn't have to be exactly like the comics! I think Marvel is stepping up their game with movies. Jonathan Majors stole the show as Kang. One of my favorite characters come to life on the big screen! (I know him from video games and shows). The way they portrayed MODOK was awesome! I had hoped Darren would be in this movie. So what if he wasn't like he was in the comics? Aren't all the characters at least SOMEWHAT different than their comic counterparts? And the "Fans" were wanting MODOK to look more like his comic counterpart after the teasers were released. And when they changed the design, they demanded that the design be changed again! Come on! Stop hating on the movies just because they weren't like your precious comics.

Author: michaelshanepolak
Review_Title: AMAZING ANT MAN MOVIE EXCEEDS EXPECTATIONS
Review: I had read all these reviews, and thought I was in for a very bad movie. That I went to the film, and saw that all these people were wrong. Obviously, they had not watched any Disney+. The Loki series is the backstory to Kang! So, if you haven't watched any of those, how could this movie make any sense to you? I don't think many of these people who gave poor reviews have any clue as to what they were watching because they haven't seen anything in the Phase 4 Disney+ marvel universe! Get a grip and start watching some of those Disney+ TV series! Then this film will make more sense. The CGI was great, the villain Kang was given more development, and the writer, who is new to the MCU by the way, did an amazing job exploring this level of the multiverse. It's going to be interesting to see how the micro and the macro multiverse's interact and intersect (I hope this is where this is going). So, watch Loki on Disney+ and allow the story to unfold. I want to point out that people need to watch the Guardians shorts before the next film releases so as to better understand what's going on. I don't like to see misinformed critics anymore.

Author: dh-51489
Review: The problem with this third outing for Ant-man isn't the story, the CGI, or the villain - it's the general viewer: us.

Author: loganalexander-19033
Review:
The Movie was good. Yes...! There was flaws but overall was good. I donno why people are complaining about the stuff. It's a solo movie what else coils we expect...? & about M. O. D. O. K,
The stuff is unreal. It's Comic Accurate. Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania, like the name it was all about quantum realm and Kang the conqueror was as cruel as in comics. Some people are complaining about Luis, he wasn't necessary in the movie or in the quantum realm. I Admire the movie a lot. And especially Katheryn Newton's (Cassie Lang) acting & hard work. She was great Cassie Lang at all. So go to theaters, & watch the movie while u can.

Author: lthegr
Review: I don't care what most say for their reviews, me and my family loved this movie! Rudd was great, Majors was excellent! Wasn't a fan of MURDOK though. This movie was to set up the next chapter in Marvel and it did that. I hope most stayed after the credits, just like most marvel movies, there is always more. But they tried to keep it kid friendly which is hard when you have a powerful village like Kang. I think they could have push the violence up a little more. I'm hoping they cover Kang a little more so fans that don't know him as much, can really learn who is and why he is the way he is. Overall, a great movie. Make sure you have seen the other ant man movies as well for a better understanding of the current events. Also watching Loki on Disney plus also will help as well. It all ties together.

Author: lauramaree
Review_Title: Been a while since I have felt this way about a Marvel Movie!
Review: Loved, loved, loved this movie!

Author: danielpaulwolfe

Review: This was a fantastic movie from start to finish. Kept me on the edge of my seat in just the right way. I think those who are complaining about the amount of CGI never lived through the late 90s movies. I think CGI in 2023 is amazing and should be overdone as much as possible. We can accomplish so much more cinematically now than we've ever been able to before and people are complaining?

Review: (This has semi-spoilers. It doesn't really spoil anything, but it does discuss some non-important parts and hints to others.)

Author: hakshay-87400
Review_Title: Not as bad as people say
Review: I'll be honest. The dialogs are so cheesy. The antics are sometimes goofy. MODOK was a letdown. But the villain was great. Kang was powerful and had a clear purpose. The new characters were entertaining. The story itself is decent with good action sequences and visual effects. Also like the other 2 Ant-man movies, this movies is paramount to the continuity of MCU. Apart from Loki, this is the only MCU phase 4 project which actually contributes towards the next phase. It fit perfectly to Loki series. It even provides closure to the end of Janet life in quantum realm which was left unexplored in Ant-man and the wasp.

Author: chrisionvision
Review_Title: That's how I like my Marvel movies
Review: I really liked this movie. It was probably the second one after Avengers: Endgame that got me really interested in and that I was excited for, before it started.

Author: ifallforeveryone
Review: Everything about this film felt like a Saturday morning cartoon. The only thing that could have made it more so was if they had been sucked into a tv and had been cartoons the entire time (which I suppose they were as it was actually all animated by computer artists).

Author: kcwilsonii
Review: Paul Rudd is in excellent form and they made sure not leave out the humor that he brings to these movies. Michelle Pfeiffer and Michael Douglas bring the drama needed to the film.

Author: lkalo-84758
Review: This movie brought so much joy into my life. Now I am one of the marvel fans who love almost anything they put out (Thor Love and Thunder was ok along with the She-Hulk Finale). However with the story of both Scott and Janet wanting more time with their kids was amazing. It really helps connect this movie with the pervious title, Ant-Man and the Wasp. I will say though the plot was a little rushed. It felt like they were in the Quantum realm too soon in the movie. I was missing Luis and I felt it would have been fairly easy to include him the first part of the movie. Anyway, the relationship between Scott and Cassy really helped make this movie a 10/10 for me.

Author: rollaamalia
Review: I read anyone who write that this movie is not good, thought that this is some sorts of fantasy-star-wars kind of movie. No it's not. Its concept is from science....if you understand, when you look through the microscope, you'll see microbes, cells, and getting smaller to atoms...that's the world is about. It's not another fantasy world. So, please begin to recall science to understand the concept of this movie.

Author: sadidonna
Review_Title: Really was good no matter what some say..
Review: I actually loved the movie! It brought the characters together and set Loki season 2 up! How much better could it get. I loved the fact that Cassie was taken under the wing of Hank and Hope to learn the Quantum science to create the beacon! It also helped to show how Janet didn't go crazy after 30 years alone, since she wasn't. The next big question is whether that Kangaroo did or did not die.

Author: TheMercurial
Review: I agree with all the negatives here, not an ant man brand movie, heavy on cgi, thin story. Doesn't matter. It's a spectacular first appearance for Kang. Huge presence, absolutely terrifying, sets the MCU tone for the next few years.

Author: ras-17365
Review:
Watched it today on Disney and I thought it was brilliant without being brilliant
It's the first of the new films for the next phase and it serves a purpose very well.

Author: rwdelos5517
Review_Title: What on earth are the critics watching?
Review: This movie is absolutely fantastic, with everything you'd want in a comic book adaption. Great cast, funny dialogue, heartbreaking dialogue, and a villain whom you can't help but feel hopeless against. At this point, people are just criticizing for just about no reason. Is it perfect? No. The Godfather is perfect. But, this movie is fun, sets up the future perfectly, and leaves you anticipating the future of its universe. Also has two of the best post credit scenes in any MCU film to date. Jonathan Majors is going to be a force in these films, and I for one can't wait to see his Kang take on the rest of the superheroes!

Author: nhurdel
Review: This movie doesn't follow the traditional marvel formula. Maybe that's why I thoroughly enjoyed it, so much so that I watched it 3 times in a two week period! It's nice to have something different, and I like that Marvel is switching it up to reduce Superhero-fatigue. The visuals in the Quantum Realm were truly breathtaking, and made it worth the price to see it IMO. The script is what you'd expect for Ant-Man, but Khang's storyline is an nice plot twist that certainly kicks things up a notch. The cut-scenes in the end tie-it into the universe, which is what makes Marvel Studios so good as what they do: they create continuity in movies as well as they do in comics. Something no one else has done as well or as lucratively to date.

Author: lmyoung-1
Review_Title: It wasn't as bad as I thought it would be.
Review: I didn't see it in theaters because I am fine watching movies at home. I thought the story was better than expected from other reviews. More development of the Kang backstory from Wasp would have been helpful in understanding which Kang was the antagonist and what his goal was. They showed some of it without storytelling, and that didn't work well without explaining through narration. It was visually well done, and the acting was consistent with the other Antman movies. When Hank Pym was showing off his experiments in his lab is another scene that could have used more narration to set up the final scene.

Author: andrewwelsh-99979
Review_Title: One of my favorite Marvel movies
Review: Kang is a force to be reckoned with. His story and introduction is very intriguing. I actually enjoyed MODOK and what they did with his character. People are bashing him about his looks but he's supposed to be weird and funny looking. I thought the cgi was pretty good compared to other recent mcu entires. This movie is very fun to watch, lots of people were laughing in the theater with me, but that didn't take away from its emotional tones. This move had some serious steaks and had restored my faith in Marvel again. I got some Star Wars vibes, specifically episode 9 but executed very well. Paul Rudd was brilliant as always and Ant-Man's suit in this movie was particularly cool, just looks wise, it's my favorite. And post credit scenes have got me curious on what the mcu has in store next. Highlights: Paul Rudd's hilarious as always but with some serious and good action scenes, Kang is just awesome, the quantum realm has never felt cooler than this, so much to see. Don't listen to critics and ratings, watch it for yourself and form your own opinion. My local theater gave out free posters that i immediately hung in my room, and the back had the poster for Guardians 3 which I can flip over to when that comes out. With his good this movie was (in my opinion) I'm excited for May 5th.

Author: cjharnetty
Review: Saw this yesterday with my son. This was a quality addition to the MCU with some breathtaking visuals and alot of fun. I've read some of the middling to negative reviews about this movie and my recommendation is simply ignore them. This was a solid introduction to kang , with kang at his weakest. The jokes hit home and had me chuckling on numerous occasions but weren't forced like in love and thunder. I think the end could have been improved with the reveal of the big danger. But overall looking forward to seeing how this escalates. Was it perfect no, was it a good enjoyable film id watch again. Absolutely. People should stop obsessing about holes.

Author: mozeezchamp
Review: At the dawn of MCU's Phase 5 this is a Excellent start and now the unexpected things are going to be turning up. In my Experience, this movie setup bigger plots for the future and I love Marvel Studios ways of story telling. This not about only Antman or Kang but it is the journey of Multi-Versal Saga.

Review: Don't know why people giving so much hate about the vfx , I've just lost in Quantum realm, yeah movie was building too much in first half like we don't know who's coming, it's like if they didn't show Kang in Trailer then, first half would have meaning overall movie was great and ending also great and post credits were unexpected just loved it , always try to go with a expectations it's solo movie, it's solo movie not a Avenger movie. Don't go with high expectations like you'll see other avengers , try to go with a mindset it's a antman movie with full of actions and thrilled scenes.

Author: gagandeepsingh-61741
Review: I don't know why so much criticism is going on with this movie but this movie is not that bad. Not a master piece movie but starts phase 5 with lots of questions about Kang which creates hype for Avengers Kang dynasty. It is a fantastic movie in the ant man trilogy other than ant man (2015) and ant man and the wasp (2018). Please stop spreading hate about this movie and watch this on the biggest screen possible to enjoy the quantum realm. Marvel ruined a character like MODOK just like Gorr in Thor love and thunder but introduction to Kang in the MCU is worth watching. Stay away from spoilers as there is a surprise cameo in the post credit scene.

Author: PorkerPerry
Review: Truly one of the marvel movies of all time. Being the biggest film connoisseur on the planet, my taste is so refined I simply do not think very highly of most modern films. However this movie delivers in every aspect... I've never felt as emotional about a movie since maybe Daredevil (2003) and Oz (2013). I think what truly made this film so breathtakingly amazing and wholeheartedly inspiring is the mix of draw-jopping action with a sort of an oaky afterbirth of a beautifully written plot. M. O. D. O. K. Is without a doubt the greatest superhero character I've ever had the pleasure to view in cinemas, he is simply too hot to not arrive for. I almost suffered from auto-erotic asphyxiation multiple times through my already 27 viewings of the film in theaters. It's simply a masterpiece. 10 out of 10 Paul Rudd extrANTaganza. Highly recommend!

Author: ClassicCinemaKid
Review: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania is a phenomenal film that manages to deliver an incredible cinematic experience with its stunning visual effects, engaging storyline, and exceptional performances. Directed by Peyton Reed, the movie has certainly lived up to its predecessor, with even more action, humor, and heart.

The start was concerning with how mediocre it was...but when I saw the angel's face...when I saw modok...I knew that I would never be the same. I laughed, I loved and I shed many tears for those that were lost. Modok, or should I say Darren, paid the ultimate price, but he died deserving of the title avenger. No movie can compare.

Author: LionBuster
Review: This movies has no flaws and I don't know why this movie flopped. First of Cassie and Kang stole the show, they could have called Cassie vs Kang and this movie would have been the same. Scott andHope is a fantastic couple and why didn't they kiss in this movie, but it doesn't ruin it at all. Hank was very funny, and useful in the 3rd act, but the rest was decent. Ant man vs Kang was awesome and it was cool that ant man didn't die. Janet was bad in this movie, but it never missed. Janet was to serious for my taste, and the story was spectacular. I think scott being a avenger got in his head lats.

Author: loveseason-63905
Review: The first hour felt like a waste of time. Some things don't make sense like why did Cassie not tell about that machine to Janet this whole time? The main character didn't really feel like the main character. The visuals were ok i guess? I don't really care about the visuals but honestly the fight scenes were really amazing and i liked how much Scott cares about her daughter in this movie, even though her daughter doesn't care about herself and her dad. She just wants him to continue risking his and his family's lifes. Even though this movie wasn't a good Ant-Man movie, i think the preparation for Kang Dynasty and Cassie being in the young avengers team was good. Although i think this movie is kind of underrated as it is definetly better than every movie they released in 2022. I hope we see more Ant-Man in the future, better.

Author: calebalwest
Review_Title: This is what I want to see when I go to a Marvel Movie
Review: I thought it was all around excellent, I really don't know why everybody else is so critical of it. The actor who plays Kang does a phenomenal job. The only downside is Luis isn't in it. It all makes sense story wise, short term and long term, and it sets up a lot of suspense for future movies and series in phase 5. People are just comparing every single marvel production to endgame now and in comparison they say it all falls short. It might not have the same overload of fan service, but I prefer that. I wouldn't listen to the hive mind on this one, I want to go and see it again! Doesn't have many of the issues that many recent marvel productions have had.

Author: cassidygarrison
Review: Great movie. Overall it left me with hope for the future of the MCU. Could have had better cgi but I get that some of the funds for this movie had to be used on black panther to reshoot half of it since Chadwick Boseman passed. M. O. D. O. K could have been done better. He face sort of looked flat. They could have just made it look like a normal head but disproportionate to everything else. I loved the concept of the movie and all of the different new creatures and worlds. The only thing I didn't really like and this is the main reason I'm giving it a nine instead of a ten is that it did have some similarities to Star Wars. Its not Star Wars! Disney. Star Wars and marvel are not meant to be mixed so don't start stealing ideas from that or any of your Disney movies! Other than that though it was great.

Author: michaelhooper2009
Review: I really enjoyed this movie. In the end it is not a bad movie, we have just had a lot of MCU films now and for the casual viewer this may be underwhelming. It has fun visuals and a fast paced story. Those still enthusiastic about the future of the MCU, and who enjoyed LOKI season 1 on Disney plus should enjoy.

Author: brandezhernandez18
Review: Listen, if you're a marvel fan, you'll love it. I think people went in expecting this to be an Avengers 4.5 the way ads have been portraying it (you're not in the wrong for expecting that) but this movie is its own thing. Was I expecting a big movie? Yes, but an Ant-Man big movie. Being a huge fan of the previous films, I knew I would love this film regardless as the director stayed the same. Even if it was the worst of the 3 (which I don't think it is) it still would be an enjoyable, fun ride. Do not listen to the critics, give this film a shot for yourself and I guarantee you will not be disappointed. Thank you.

There is also humor in this movie. I laughed at some of the moments. I think it's a good start to Phase Five, but it's not the best Marvel movie.

Author: murkee
Review_Title: Fun - but don't think too hard
Review: I enjoyed the heck out of this - nice to see Kang properly in the MCU, but I did have some issues with the internal consistency of Ant Man going bigger and smaller than quantum's scale... he's a slow lumbering thing when he's large but *still subatomic*. That kind of works if the quantum world is faster than our world, but not otherwise.

Author: visitsuman
Review: The way critics and some so called viewers talk really bad about the film film bt it's not that bad like Thor Love And Thunder... I am not saying that it was a masterpiece bt it was okk and a great start for phase5 of marvel.. Kang's charecter is the best.. Author: nickclarkturner
Review: Excited for the future of the MCU. Have been hyped for this movie ever since learning it would be a continuation of Kang's character established in the great show Loki. Was concerned about the negative reviews going into this but I have no idea what their problem was. It was 100% an Ant Man movie continuing the story of the previous 2, expanding on it in a way that was interesting, entertaining, and hilarious. Obviously the stakes have gotten higher than the previous installments but it did a great balance of comedy, drama, and action further establishing Kang as a worthy MCU Phase 4-6 villain. Can't wait for the next season of Loki and any other installment that is going to add to this narrative, especially when done as masterfully as this.

Author: madelyntax
Review: As a longtime mcu fan (both movies & comics), I absolutely loved this movie. It absolutely doesn't deserve all the hate. Aside from some gross dialogue at the start, the story line and tension was there throughout. Genuinely had me at the edge of my seat. Jonathan Majors CRUSHED it once again, not surprised. Fun cameos. So many pure "Ant-Man" type moments and humor. Love Paul Rudd.

Author: iwasafool

Review: I don't understand the bad reviews. The movie was good, I really enjoyed.

Author: kipngetichd
Review: Show takes us for fun twist filled with suspence and adventure as we are taken through different realities and culture as the characters find themselves in different regions and communities. This movies has a twist of exposing past lives and how they get affect the future. Its a family movie with main characters being a loving family with their ups and downs as well as dark sides who do anything to save their family. The villain also does a great job at being evil, he displays the ability to entice the viewers into his side with his resilient nature. The movie is all in all superb n must watch.

Review: Am I missing something? I've seen multiple reviews call this the worst movie they've ever seen. It wasn't too long, it introduced Kang and was constantly giving us new information. Review: Honestly, I don't understand why metacritic's score is so low. It's a decent Marvel's movie, better then many others Marvel's productions seen recently (two for all: "Thor Love and Thunder" and "She Hulk").

Author: vikrantyadavikky
Review: Obviously I highly recommended the kang amazing dangerous kang Mcu phase dangerous world in life the world of course is a great idea to pass time with us time or time highly addictive and very very excellent to watch phase five start time with the same time in multiverse the world is a different world of mostly a good life to the one in the next few years or more years of being a wallflower first season with you or the next time highly of course I love coming back from a world of a great time with you so much love phase five of us you will try again next time you will see phase five starts kang.

Author: alzhranimoath
Review: Finally ant-man and Wasp: quantumania arrived bringing with it a fresh start for the phase 5 and I can't describe how happy I am. Clean movie, good characters, fantastic acting specially form Paul Rudd, peak villain and side villains. The movie gave us a brief about Kang and what he capable of, and a big picture of the villain that we will see in the next phases. The movie also showed us a perfect story for Scott with his family and how he tried to stop his daughter to be like him. I loved how we saw the old friend Darin returning as M. O. D. O. K and how he changed during the movie. In conclusion the movie is good and perfect start for phase 5 and I hope that they will keep it like this.

Author: masa-81061
Review: It's an entertaining watch and I left the showing in a good mood, so that's a win for me. Jonathan Mayors portrayal of Kang stole the movie so I'm excited for Phase 5. Of course, there are some things are were a bit meh but it didn't impact the movie in a mayor way. An ok movie.

Author: kaveeshainduwaralk
Review: "Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania" is a highly anticipated movie that promises to deliver an action-packed and entertaining experience for Marvel fans. With its impressive cast and talented director, the film is set to explore the Quantum Realm even further and introduce new characters and storylines.

Author: bradnation-74330
Review: I think many of the negative reviews are just people jumping on the bandwagon. I really enjoyed the movie. They didn't make the hero too stupid as they have been doing lately. (Thor, Shazam)

Author: hayriomerdener
Review: It is a movie in which, at the age of 52, I found exactly what my imagination was able to create while reading books since my childhool. In the 70s, it was predicted to me that in the present time we would fly with cars and our homes would be more like those of the Jetsons. Well, all that, didn't come to pass.

Author: kajay-15019
Review:
This movie was full of comedy which is usually seen in Antman movies. But this was full of action and the way they introduced Kang the Conqueror was my favourite part..
The kicking of phase 5 was epic as expected and Marvel has learned a lot from his phase 4 mistakes..
The vfx, cgi, action, direction everything was perfect from the inside out..
This is a good signal for phase 5 and marvel also. This movie is gonna change the MCU forever. Kang the conqueror was comic accurate and badass
Marvel is gonna gain it's charm as it was in Phase 3 or even more than that.

Author: silverlykos-89378
Review: I honestly don't understand the complaints about this movie. I mean this movie explores the quantum universe like anything I've ever seen. It really puts things into perspective on the amazement of worlds that seem to be infinitely smaller than our own. The Cgi is spectacular, the creatures amazing, the vehicles look awe inspiring as well. I kept seeing the previews to this movie and not even the trailers were disappointing unlike so many I've seen before for countless other movies. I find the sequels to each Marvel character seem to get better. Thor's are a bit of a roller coaster and I'm not really sure about the Hulk's. Like i said, wonderful cgi exploration, great character development.

Author: peterfbrand-89486
Review_Title: Ahhhh, that's better a marvel movie that felt like Marvel
Review: Brilliant, finally a movie that starts pulling together the confusing threads that have been laid over the past 8 years.

Author: darenlouison
Review_Title: Not the Mess People have said it would be. :::LOKI Spoilers:::
Review: I would have to agree with most, that the direction marvel has taken with most of its new content (Post endgame) has been like watching an icecream van trying to put in its best lap time, on the Nurbergring.

Author: phillip-west-97042
Review: This movie was really fun! I don't understand why it was picked apart by critics, but then again they lived Banshees of Ishirin and that movie was horrible and nothing!

Author: thatirken
Review: I liked this movie, quite a bit. I've never seen a my of the other ant man installments but this was pretty easy to understand with a basic knowledge of prior marvel films. I will admit the CGI was questionable at times and some of the humour didn't land very well, but I left the theater feeling pretty damn good. The action sequences were cool and exciting, and Kang is a formidable villain, and I'm excited to see more of him. I wish the movie had focused a bit more on tying off the ant man trilogy, but I do like how they opened the doors to the future. I feel like this is a pretty solid way to kick of phase 5.

Author: serenarotaru
Review: Firstly, I can't get the hate around this movie. This is the PERFECT beginning for Phase 5. I absolutely loved this movie, with it's bad CGI in some places, with some bad dialogue, with some obvious plot holes... But, man, this was good.

Author: vaughnyonlinsky
Review: 10 out of 10 modok dies an avenger. Bro had bigger cheeks than Kim cardashian. Single handedly killed kang. Then in a post credit scene modok meets saul goodmam and they sets up better fuel huel. 10 out of 10 must watch. I rate it secound in the breaking bad universe behind bitter coleslaw. This masterpiece of filmmaking must be shown to every person on the planet. It cured my cancer brought back my dad, got me a wife, gave me a million dollars, and tucked me into bed and read me a bedtime story. This is what I call a masterpiece of filmaking its perfect in every way possible. It revals minions 2 as my favorite movie.

Author: rohitkumar-77147
Review: This movie is very good. Battle was very good kang full power and ant man .Movie is very good. The people who are giving it a bad rating they are crazy, they don't understand the movie., I don't know whether this movie will have high rating or low . But movie is awesome and fighting sequel and story is awesome .

Author: jmanutor
Review_Title: Not mind blowing but generally fun
Review: I think Marvel fans have been mostly affected by this past year with bad deliveries. This one is not bad. It's a good start for a new phase and we should give them a chance. The after credits are good. The story is not bad, the only think is i would've liked more tragedy in Ant-Man movies, something more intense or maybe less predictable. I missed Michael pena as well but generally the movie holds it's comedy side really good. Let's see how Loki 2 and the rest of the upcoming marvel features are for 2023. Kang has potential to be a great villain and i can't wait to see him interacting with other superheroes.

Author: essessr
Review: Jonathan Majors (Kang) was the best highlight of movie, he overshadows everything when he is on screen. We can see the potential. As an AntMan movie this is good and starts the Phase 5 in a good way. Story wasn't really impressive except Janet and Kang's relation. In first half story was running in slow pace but that was good but the second half should have been like that, but it runs faster than the first half. Camera work is not as good as the previous two movies but it has some serious stuff in it. Overall I loved the movie and is enjoyable and I can say that Marvel is really back in the game.

Author: BlasterCA2000
Review_Title: I don't know what people wanted/expected
Review: Quantumania is a good ol' fashioned Marvel Cinematic Universe over the top science fiction Superheroes action movie.

Author: darishkakoroleva
Review_Title: The beginning of Phase 5 was so impressive!
Review: Spoiler Free: I got goosebumps and for me that means the movie was a success. Frankly speaking, expectations were a little too high and those who watch the film will understand what is at stake. However, I am ready to give 100 out of 10 to Jonathan Majors for his game! His tears in his eyes throughout the scenes amazed me. This is really a very, very good villain for Marvel. And I'm sure that despite all the action in this film, in the future, this character will have a much more reverent and intriguing motivation than Thanos. I personally liked Kathryn Newton, the motivation is written quite well for a teenager, and in general, I hope the potential of the character will be well revealed in future projects. Not 10 out of 10 for sure. But the beginning of Phase 5 looks quite impressive!

Author: aedendorlando
Review: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania was very entertaining to watch and see all the stunning visual effects. A lot of the movie used visual effects that looked amazing and probably took the VFX crew hundreds of hours to make. One part I enjoyed watching was when Ant-Man turned huge and was destroying everything in his path to get to Kang the Conquer because he did not keep his end of the deal they made. After Kang went out and started shooting lasers at everyone I found a Easter egg, which was when Kang froze the spear mid air. This is very similar to when Kylo Ren froze a blaster shot from Poe Dameron mid air in Star Wars the Force Awakens. Overall it was a great movie and fun to watch.

Author: liamrengers
Review: Don't listen to critics or any of the lower numbers I promise you this will be movie of the year acting was great and the introduction for kang with Johnathan Majors was incredible visual effects was just crazy. Plot was very well written. It still is able to keep a little bit of that comedy that ant man movies usually have. This movie is definitely a must see. I can't wait to see what's next and what marvel has coming for us. This movie blew my mind and is setting up a lot for what's to come. If you love marvel, you will definitely love this. Great movie all around. Every actor and actress did great.

Author: jdhgpr
Review_Title: A great movie with a few flaws
Review: The movie itself was very fun and important to the marvel cinematic universe Paul rudd was fantastic as ant man and the movie balanced comedy and seriousness quite well.

Author: jjsomers-18612
Review: Although critics haven't appreciated this movie, I stand with the majority of fans who enjoyed this film. I have been a fan of the MCU for many years, and really liked parts of Phase 4 when many others did not. However, in my opinion, this film is on the same level as some of my favorites. I have very few criticisms, and I am looking forward to the future of Kang. Every performance was great, and there were many wonderfully comedic moments. The MCU's rendition of MODOK is delightfully unsettling in his appearance, and definitely brought comedy to several of the films more serious moments. 10/10.

Author: parkkila-21
Review_Title: This movie aint getting enough love.
Review: This is my first time Im writing an review. Beacause this movie rate is to damn low. I think the marvel fans are spoiled and dont appreciate a good movie. Problably to high expectations. But Marvel have also pumped out to many movies and series. "Less is more"

Author: gretchiekc-62170
Review: As someone who absolutely despised almost everything in Phase 4 (ESPECIALLY THOR LOVE AND THUNDER - Seriously, how did Thor become such an idiotic clown?) I had low expectations for this. I loved Jonathon Majors portrayal of Kang in Loki...and Paul Rudd is Paul Rudd, so I was holding out hope I wouldn't be begging to leave the theatre 20 minutes into the movie like I did with TL&T.

Author: jtdeferio
Review: I went into the theater with low expectations due to Marvel's blunders and wokeness in Phase 4. I was came away surprised and pleased with the story and the visuals. The movie is NOT woke, not in the least. No f-words either.

Author: hellscream-27872
Review: This movie somehow managed to be exactly the same like Rings of power but on the same time the complete opposite. How ?

Author: monobunny-49149
Review: I loved the CGI in this movie. The shots were amazing and the characters there uniquie, as always. Paul's character was so endearing and as always I could root for him, but Janet was so frustrating. She kept so much away from the others and I thought she did something bad willingly. I also did not like the ending though. I thought Scott and Hope would need to find a way to get out of the Quantum Realm after defeating Kang, but their problem was quickly resolved. Also Kang was only defeated by being stepped on by a few ants? Really? I cannot wait to see his character more though, it is really intriguing.

Author: colston-83156
Review_Title: One of the better Marvel movies of late
Review: Really enjoyed the movie. Was far far better than Love and Thunder and I enjoyed it more than Wakanda Forever. I'm quite surprised at the low scores, this was as good as the 2nd ant man, if you liked that and liked the first then you will enjoy this one as I did. The plot was sound, the GGI was fine but nothing compared to something like Shang-Chi. The characters are basically the same as in the other ant man movies, however Kang was an absolute standout here. One of the best villains so far in the MCU and this movie makes me incredibly excited to see where they take his character. Highly recommend.

Author: schmicol
Review_Title: This is a cracker of a film!
Review: Loved it! Jonathan Majors as Kang is infinitely watchable...I relished every moment of his performance. Been looking forward to this since Loki. "Are you the one with the hammer?" Great line. He is terrifying. And we'll see more of him soon!

Author: fumbles-38016
Review_Title: Better then people are letting on
Review: This movie was very entertaining and was well done. I don't know why they are giving it a low rating. I honestly thought that this one was a lot better then the second one and I was stick this movie right next to Guardians 2. I feel like the pace was good and the story was good too. Also kang was definitely stealing the scream for me, every time I saw kang I was scared, what a great way for a villain to be more introduced. They movie was very funny, I haven't laughed that hard at a marvel movie since Guardians 2. Everyone giving this movie a bad review just saddens me because they take marvel to seriously sometimes.

Author: danni-16763
Review_Title: A great addition to the Kang saga
Review: This film tied up more loose ends than any film up until now from this saga....

Author: sachinch-74056
Review: This is a quality film. It is (as every movie with Paul Rudd should be) hilarious, but more than that it brings together so many pieces of the Marvel universe like the quantum realm and the multiverse, and crafts them together so beautifully. Jonathan Majors as Kang the Conqueror is stellar, and I am excited to see him (in many different costumes) in future Marvel films. Additionally, Paul Rudd, Evangeline Lilly, and all of the supporting cast are amazing as well. Overall one of the best movie i have seen in many tear. Nice direction, nice music, nice acting. It was fun to watch with friends and family.

Author: chasemmarshall
Review_Title: An Awesome Film and one of the Best 3rd movies of Marsdvel Hero
Review: Ant-Man and Wasp: Quantimania is easily one Marvel's Top 7 films. While switching between humor and seriousness, it managed to never get boring and had me chuckling at random interactions the whole way through. It feels like a mix between the first Guardians of the Galaxy and Thor Ragnarok in both humor and a diversity(in personalities and groups) with a strong Star Wars influence.

Author: aimeebuzz
Review: Strong start. Some people still expect every new marvel film to be like endgame, and this isn't it since that's not realistic. Recommend. It was fun to watch. I didn't watch any trailers over then the first one so there was a lot of surprises in the for me. It makes me excited for the next films to come out. The end credit seems were exciting and were like the other films were they were just joke ones. The characters were exciting and not boring. They were also some fun new characters which I hope to see again. It's a very good watch for the start of phase 5 and it's essential to see. Overall I love it!

Author: gaddyjohn
Review: Quantum Mania provides viewers with a humorous and action-packed Marvel adventure that maintains their interest throughout the film. The compelling narrative of the movie, when coupled with the film's impressive visual effects and outstanding performances, makes for an enjoyable viewing experience. Despite the fact that it might not be the most impressive installment in the series, there are a lot of exciting moments and funny jokes. The journey through the immersive quantum realm will be a treat for anyone who enjoys the characters. Hold on tight, because you're about to embark on an adventure that more than lives up to the legacy of Ant-Man and the Wasp.

Author: marvelcinematicchronology
Review: Absolutely love the movie, it continues perfectly the two predecessor films of Ant-Man. I liked the monologue of Scott in the beginning and end, the MVP is held by Kang and the original Wasp, Janet van Dyne. I liked Darren's development, I understand that he was there for ten years and now he has to have a different personality after being humiliated for so long by Kang. But what captivated me the most was the immersive and peculiar Microuniverse in the Quantum Realm and the funny creatures, I really hope to see more of that Microuniverse in the future. The Wasp of Hope wasn't so present in the middle of the movie but she got an strong start revealing something very important about her future, Scott's Ant-Man was in charge of arranging everything with his daughter, while Hank's Ant-Man gets an epic moment in the end, I wish we could see a proyect or more flashbacks of Hank Pym as a young Ant-Man. And for me, the title of "Wasp" is more for Janet and everything she had hidden in those 30 years that she was lost, but I really loved the movie and i can't wait to see more of Kang in Loki 2!.

Author: imrlyagod
Review:
I don't know why I'm not a big ant man fan but this movie was different it reminded me of 2000 superhero movie that , it was good and there is nothing i can say to make your decision better you have to watch it yourself
i just really like that they added an extra element to this with many possibilities .

Author: ahsankhan-79903
Review: Watched the movie last evening and honestly don't agree with or even see where the hate for the movie is coming from.

Author: mdunlevy-07488
Review: This movie was fun and great. Characters I love like ant man,wasp, and hank pym and new characters like M. O. D. O. K and the dude with the yellow blasters thingy for a head and Kang omg he is a amazing villian and I can't wait to see him in the future of the mcu. I liked the how ant man and the end of the movie was thinking like is the dude I just fought is he really dead but he carries on with it like nothing happen. It sucked that M. O. D. O. K died but he had a cool arc and it was cool to see Darren again and how he turned and how Kang saved him. The only thing I didn't like was how Bill Murray character was served though.

Author: david_divm
Review: Not a classic like Captain America 2, GotG 1, Iron Man, or the Avengers; but a very solid and entertaining family film.

Author: aapomatiasvilja
Review: In Ant-man Quantumania, we all saw kang. The one that got banished into Quantum realm. Well Kang was also in the loki series. See in loki there was a Guy named *The one who remains* And he could destroy timelines and see to the future. He could probably also move in different Universes. So he had the same capabilities as Kang. *The one who remains* Was probably another version of kang or kang himself before he got the name. *The one who remains* Was also played by the same Actor Jonathan Majors. I see this as genius as they taked a character from Loki and maked another version of him. Then out him in Antman. Also at the end of Quantumania we see after the Texts a video where is loki and Mobius Looking at Kang/The one who remains. This confirms my theory.

Author: thomaswik
Review_Title: DO NOT LISTEN TO THE CRITICS!!!
Review: Ok, look i have never reviewed a movie on imdb but when i see the insane amount of negative reviews i just had to. This has to be one of my favorite marvel movies of all time. I went to see it expecting dissapointment due to the amount of negative reviews it has. But man was i blown away by how fun this movie was. From the very start i was engaged and sat in suspense at what is coming next. The locations during this movie looked very good. Jonathan Majors acting is incredible and terrifying, and him playing Kang was just meant to be. Kang is my new favorite villain and my favorite character of the MCU alongside Loki. Yes, it has some plotholes but EVERY marvel movie does, and for me it made sense to the extent where i can see where phase 5/6 is going. It seems like people have forgotten what a good marvel movie looks like.

Author: christopherramus
Review: This was a fantastic entry into the next MCU phase. Jonathan Majors plays a phenomenal Kang- despite whatever legal troubles he's enmeshed in, and whether he's innocent or guilty - the rage and betrayal and hurt and menace that he puts into this character, it's difficult to picture any other known actor doing such a job. I've known folks to complain about the story and the CGI here. But they need to stop comparing every new MCU product to Endgame and Infinity War. This is an overall excellent entry into the Kang story arc for anyone willing to give it an honest shake.

Author: marashianbehnam-23780
Review_Title: As a science fiction fan, this is a great sequel to the first two Ant-Man movies.
Review: Impressive visual effects, cool technology, fun action sequences and hilarious gags. This Ant-Man sequel had it all. I'm a science fiction fan, and yet this movie is truly enjoyable. Paul Rudd, Evangeline Lilly, Michelle Pfeiffer, Kathryn Newton, Jonathon Majors, Tony McCarthy, Bill Murray, Samuel L. Jackson, Michael Peña, Michael Douglas, Randall Park, William Jackson Harper, Hannah John-Kamen, Walton Goggins, David Bertucci, Bobby Cannavale, David Dastmalchian, Judy Greer, Corey Stoll, Wood Harris, Sean Kleier, Gregg Turkington, Katy M. O'Brian, Ruben Rabasa and Patton Oswalt all played their roles very well. What a great MCU movie.

Author: broshrimp
Review: I had a good time with this film. Beautiful skyboxes, Rudd being funny, Lilly being sexy. Majors as Kang is vicious and terrifying, Ant Man really makes the hero turn in this film leading into Phase 5 and 6, with guest appearances by Stinger and M. O. D. O. K.. Really has a 5-8 issue comic book arc feel, jumping right into the action, while managing to do a lot of world building. I only wish there was more Wasp action in this film, but there was enough. Can never get enough an og leader of the Avengers though. Can't wait to see more Ant Man vs Kang.

Author: adamianwebb
Review_Title: Definitely Worth A Watch, Despite Overwhelmingly Negative Reviews
Review: A very entertaining film. Ant-Man is often seen as a lesser/less interesting character compared to some of the bigger superheroes in the Marvel domain, but Paul Rudd and the rest of the cast and the crew have certainly elevated his standing in my opinion. I wish I made the time to see it in the cinema.

Author: bambookamer
Review_Title: Not a bad start to phase 5
Review: Wow!! Ok so this was a pretty good entry into the MCU. I know the critics on RT hit it hard and I'm sure some fans will feel the same. But considering how Phase 4 landed I actually found this movie to be a breath of fresh air. It's very much like a Sci-fi movie and very different than many MCU movies but I didn't mind that at all. It does feel like a combination of other sci-fi films like Star Wars, again not a problem for me personally.
